data.text: Great stay, super convenient location right next to train station. Justice was extremely helpful with bags and arranging taxis to airport for our large family. Thanks to the whole staff for making our Barcelona experience a memorable one.
data.title: Great stay

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear QQ933, 
Thank you for choosing Nobu Hotel Barcelona. We are delighted to read you fully enjoyed your stay and the hotel, reaching our goals to create a memorable experience as you mention, and to provide with the best services to all our guests. We will forward your comment to Justice to promote their amazing work as well as to the whole team. 
We look forward to welcoming you and your family back to Nobu hotel during your next visit in Barcelona. 
Best regards. 
Gerard Sala, Operations and Quality Coordiantor
owner_response.author: Nobu Barcelona

data.text:
Hotel is modern and beautiful with Japanese inspiration. The fitout is new and fresh - suites are so spacious! 
Service is outstanding 
Late check out was brilliant for travellers waiting for flights or trains
Beautiful foyer with bar and food. 
All the food was lovely
data.title: Nobu was beautiful

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Corrienm949, 
Thank youvery much for your review. Our rooms and hotel is designed by the New Yorker David Rockwell. It is meant to reveal a warm minimalist style fused with a Japanese design that focuses on comfort and space. Wea re charmed to read you as well enjoyed our facilities and venues and we hope to welcome you back at Nobu hotel during your next visit to Barcelona. 
Warm regards. 
Gerard Sala, Operations and Quality Coordinator
owner_response.author: Nobu Barcelona

data.text: Nice and clean hotel , we had a very pleasant experience with justice who work there. He was so kind and friendly. He helped us for everything we need. Also hotel located near by Barcelona Sants train station which is very convenient for travel Madrid, Valencia or any other places. Over all  we enjoyed staying at this hotel.
data.title: Al p. USA

data.text: Justice is amazing! This hotel has best service ever! Clean rooms, amazing people, and beautiful structure! When we came we were greeted very well. Justice is the best person! They clean everyday and make sure we get everything we need! So happy!
data.title: Nobu Hotel Five Stars
